ygData.subject: Ore For Free?
ygData.msgSnippet: I just read a message on eqvault general board that you can find ore for free.  Can anyone confirm this and wish to divulge this information to the rest of us
ygData.messageBody:
I just read a message on eqvault general board that you can find ore for
free. Can anyone confirm this and wish to divulge this information to the
rest of us in this forum?

And the exact recipe for studs is:

Studs = 3 Metal Bits + File + Flask
File = Metal Bits + File Mold + Flask
Metal Bits = 2 Pieces of Ore + Flask
8 Pieces of Ore = 440
6 Flasks of Water = 66
1 File Mold = 12
1 Stud = 518
And this is at perfect 100% completion.
There are 3 seperate steps to make Studs:
1) Make the Bits
2) Make the File
3) Make the Studs
So you need to have a good skill level to make them.
Base Cost = 518
Sale Price = 800 to 1000
That was cut from a message on the same thread as the one that stated there
is free ore to be found.

Keep the information flowing...

-=Ailenu=-
